summary: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.
cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.|James Coburn|Sisqó|Nichelle Nichols|M. Emmet Walsh|Graham Greene|Brian Doyle-Murray|Joanna Bacalso|Jean Michel Paré|Michael Bolton|Jason Pouliotte|David Boyce|Frank C. title: Aventuras en Alaska
